page.shortlink: api objects table object field name get function
page.description: Retrieve field names in a cr-lf separated list.
page.discussion: The <TBL>.FIELD_NAME_GET() method returns the names of the fields in a table.
page.example: dim tbl as P tbl = table.open("customer") ? tbl.field_name_get() = Customer_id Firstname Lastname Company Phone Fax Bill_address_1 Bill_address_2 Bill_city Bill_state_region Bill_postal_code Bill_country Ship_address_1 Ship_address_2 Ship_city Ship_state_region Ship_postal_code Ship_country Ship_same Email Rtfmemo
